Package chess.model

package chess.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    chess.model.exceptions
     
    chess.model.moves
     
    chess.model.pieces
     
    chess.model.player
     
  • Class
    Description
    Chessboard
    A class that represents a chessboard in a Chess game and manages the Chess pieces that are associated with it.
    ChessGame
    A class that manages the lifecycle and state of a single Chess game.
    ChessGame.States
    An enumeration of possible states of the game, which can be conclusive or inconclusive.
    Color
    A binary color enumeration: White or Black.
    Colored
    An abstract entity that is to be inherited by any object that plays a color-dependent role in a Chess game, including but may not be limited to all concrete subtypes of Player, Piece, and Movable.
    Position
    A class that represents a position in the chessboard, defined by: a file letter, the horizontal position, represented by an integer index in the range [1, 8]; a rank number, the vertical position, an integer in the range [1, 8]. This class defines all operations associated with positions.
    TextSymbols
    A utility class consisting of definitions for all relevant text symbols.
    Transformation
